abstract: Wal-Mart said it had ended the business because Hewlett-Packard, a chief technology partner, had decided to discontinue essential infrastructure for the service.
snippet: Wal-Mart said it had ended the business because Hewlett-Packard, a chief technology partner, had decided to discontinue essential infrastructure for the service.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Nearly a year ago, Wal-Mart Stores grandly announced plans to enter the movie download business. It has exited with much less fanfare.

headline.main: Wal-Mart Pulls Plug on Movies via the Web
headline.print_headline: Wal-Mart Pulls Plug On Movies Via the Web

byline.original: By Matt Richtel and Brad Stone
